name: Instagram
desc: Create an account or log in to Instagram. Connect with friends, find other fans, and see what people around you are up to and into.

name: TikTok
desc: Trends start here. On a device or on the web, viewers can watch and discover millions of personalized short videos.

name: Facebook
desc: Create an account or log into Facebook. Connect with friends, family and other people you know. Share photos and videos, send messages and get updates.

name: YouTube
desc: Share your videos with friends, family, and the world.

name: Google
desc: Search the world's information, including webpages, images, videos and more.

name: ChatGPT
desc: We've trained a model called ChatGPT which interacts in a conversational way.

name: ESPN
desc: Visit ESPN for live scores, highlights and sports news. Stream exclusive games on ESPN+ and play fantasy sports.

name: Discord
desc: Discord is great for playing games and chilling with friends, or even building a worldwide community. Customize your own space to talk, play, and hang out.

name: GitHub
desc: Millions of developers and businesses call GitHub home. Whether you're scaling your development process or just learning how to code, GitHub is where you belong.

name: Twitch
desc: Twitch is an interactive livestreaming service for content spanning gaming, entertainment, sports, music, and more.

name: Snapchat
desc: Chat, send Snaps, explore Stories, and try Lenses on desktop, or download the app on mobile!

name: X
desc: From breaking news and entertainment to sports and politics, get the full story with all the live commentary.

name: Telegram
desc: Telegram lets you access your chats from multiple devices.

name: Soundcloud
desc: Discover and play over 320 million music tracks. Join the world's largest online community of artists, bands, DJs, and audio creators.

name: Amazon
desc: Free shipping on millions of items. Get the best of Shopping and Entertainment with Prime.

name: Pinterest
desc: Discover recipes, home ideas, style inspiration and other ideas to try.
